name: Makin Breakfast
description:
Game created for the LOWREZJAM 2020 game jam.

Physics based 2 Player couch VS game, one player use WASD to move, the other use the arrow keys.  The goal is to get to 10 points before your opponent.  Racket ball rules: hit the ball after your opponent before it touches the ground, and don't hit it twice in a row.
